title: TS Talent Group Launches as Specialized Agency Powering Celebrity-Driven Brand Campaigns
description: TS Talent Group is the behind-the-scenes talent partner for agencies, production companies, and consumer brands, with the goal of streamlining celebrity endorsement campaigns on TV, digital, and social media.
content:
TS Talent Group, LLC has formally launched as a specialized agency dedicated to overseeing the operational and compliance facets of brand partnerships involving well-known public figures. TS Talent Group is the behind-the-scenes talent partner for agencies, production companies, and consumer brands, with the goal of streamlining celebrity endorsement campaigns on TV, digital, and social media.

TS Talent Group, which was established to support the fast-paced world of brand marketing, collaborates with athletes, influencers, and celebrities from a variety of industries to ensure that talent deliverables, approvals, and union compliance are handled precisely. The agency manages all the logistics needed to ensure a campaign runs smoothly, whether it entails SAG-AFTRA on-camera commercials, digital spokesperson videos, or social media partnerships.

The company's service model aims to remove the conflict that frequently arises when well-known talent collaborates directly with brands. From deal structuring and script coordination to tracking talent usage and on-set logistics, TS Talent Group takes care of it all. While TS Talent Group makes sure the execution complies with platform, union, and other requirements, agencies and marketing teams are free to concentrate on the creative.

In contrast to conventional agencies, TS Talent Group prioritizes operations and provides a white-labeled infrastructure that seamlessly integrates with ongoing productions. To guarantee smooth and stress-free talent participation, the team regularly collaborates with production companies, public relations agencies, and internal brand teams.

TS Talent Group has supported talent across a variety of campaigns in the health, wellness, beauty, consumer products, and lifestyle categories. From celebrity testimonials and long-form infomercials to podcast sponsorships and broadcast commercials, the agency’s work is designed to scale across multiple channels while maintaining regulatory compliance.

In an industry where timing, approvals, and licensing can make or break a campaign, TS Talent Group offers a modern solution for working with public-facing talent in a way that’s reliable, scalable, and sound. Learn more at TSTalentGroup.com.
summary: TS Talent Group, LLC has launched a specialized agency dedicated to overseeing the operational and regulatory aspects of celebrity-driven brand campaigns. The agency partners with athletes, influencers, and celebrities to ensure that talent deliverables, approvals, and union compliance are met with precision. It also provides a white-labeled infrastructure that seamlessly integrates with ongoing productions.
shortSummary: TS Talent Group, LLC, is a specialized agency dedicated to facilitating celebrity endorsement campaigns, ensuring seamless execution and compliance within brand marketing environments.

scraped_sources.text:
We specialize in the operational and compliance aspects of high-profile brand partnerships, ensuring smooth execution and compliance every step of the way.
Talent Operations & Deal Management
“TS Talent Group, LLC is a specialized firm focused on the operational and compliance aspects of brand partnerships involving high-profile public figures. Our focus is on structuring campaigns that feature celebrities, athletes, and media personalities to ensure all talent deliverables, approvals, and usage rights are managed smoothly and in compliance with union guidelines.
Our Services —
-
We issue and manage campaign agreements, ensuring all terms are clearly outlined and aligned with talent deliverables.
-
We coordinate timelines, approvals, and final deliverables between talent and brand partners — ensuring nothing gets lost in translation.
-
All campaigns are reviewed to meet platform-specific guidelines, protecting both brand and talent interests.
-
We act as the main liaison for availability, scheduling, on-set logistics, and asset delivery, minimizing back-and-forth.
-
We structure and document usage rights, likeness permissions, exclusivity terms, and related union requirements.
-
For union talent, we oversee filings, session fees, pension & health contributions, and compliance paperwork.
-
Expertise in High-Profile Campaigns
With years of experience managing campaigns featuring celebrities, athletes, and media personalities, we understand the nuances of working with recognizable voices.
-
Compliance You Can Trust
We support your campaigns in aligning with all union and other platform guidelines to assist with talent and brand related protections.
-
Efficient Operations
From backend talent coordination to timely approvals and deliverables, we streamline processes to keep campaigns moving smoothly.
GET IN TOUCH
Administrative inquiries — Use the contact form for documentation requests or to learn more about our services

argos_summary: TS Talent Group, LLC has launched as a specialized agency that manages the operational and compliance aspects of brand partnerships with high‑profile public figures, including athletes, influencers, and celebrities. The firm handles everything from deal structuring, script coordination, and talent approvals to union filings, usage rights, and platform‑specific guidelines, allowing agencies and brands to focus on creative work. By providing a white‑labeled infrastructure and white‑glove logistics, TS Talent Group aims to streamline celebrity endorsement campaigns across TV, digital, and social media, ensuring smooth execution and regulatory compliance.
